anime.name: One Piece
anime.info: Before he was executed, the legendary Pirate King Gold Roger revealed that he had hidden the treasure One Piece somewhere in the Grand Line. Now, many pirates are off looking for this legendary treasure to claim the title Pirate King. One pirate, Monkey D. Luffy, is a boy who had eaten the Devil's Fruit and gained rubber powers. Now he and his crew are off to find One Piece, while battling enemies and making new friends along the way.
#3: "Towards the Light (English Version)" by Vic Mignogna (eps 117-168)
#4: "Bon Voyage (English Version)" by Brina Palencia (English dub; eps 169-205)
#7: "We Are! ~Straw Hat Pirate Version~" by the Straw Hat Pirates (eps 279-283)
#18: "Hard Knock Days" by GENERATIONS from EXILE TRIBE (eps 687-)
#02: "RUN! RUN! RUN! (English Version)" by Caitlin Glass (eps 31-63)
#03: "Watashi ga iru Yo" (私がいるよ) by TOMATO CUBE (eps 64-73)
#03: "You've Got Me (English Version)" by Leah Clark (eps 64-73)
#04: "That's a Fact! (English Version)" by Stephanie Young (eps 74-81)
#07: "Glory ~Because You're Here~ (English Version)" by Caitlin Glass (eps 107-116)
#07: "Glory ~Kimi ga iru Kara~" by Takako Uehara (eps 107-116)
#12: "Moon and Sun (English Version)" by Stephaine Young (eps 182-195)
#12: "Tsuki to Taiyō" (月と太陽; "Moon and Sun") by shela (eps 182-195)
Fuji TV's Official One Piece Homepage
